title: Juan Carlos Leaño
text:
Juan Carlos Leaño Del Castillo (born 22 November 1977) is a Mexican former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who played his whole career with <a href="Estudiantes%20Tecos">Tecos</a>. Leaño made his professional debut with Estudiantes in 1998. He is also the son of <a href="Jos%C3%A9%20Antonio%20Lea%C3%B1o">José Antonio Leaño</a>, chairman of the club.
On 27 April 2012, after his team lost the permanence in the <a href="Liga%20MX">Mexican Primera División</a> Leaño announced his retirement from football.
